Row.Text: The Atlatlist is a unique only available for the Maya, replacing the Archer. It is cheaper and available sooner than the Archer, but has a lower melee strength.

The Atlatlist is the Mayan unique unit, replacing the Archer. Atlatlists are cheaper than a traditional Archer, and available earlier without having to research Archery, but are more fragile if subjected to a melee attack. This early game advantage allows other research priorities to come into play.
